Text: TNPC Cc Molly Attached is the spreadsheet that outlines TNPCs billing and receipt history There were a few invoices out over days but the majority pay within days after due date some even before the due date Out of the k that is outstanding there is an invoice for k that went to the gas desk James Barker today for proof of delivery and volume issues This amount was not marked on the dispute log Another invoice for k is currently on the dispute log for an undertake penalty and has come to partial resolution The remaining k is a collection issue as collection calls to Chris Miceli have not indicated a dispute but rather a confirmation to pay Due to the nature of this customer CSC handles the collection of this customer internally Please let me know if you need any additional information Joni Fisher
